title: Pencil Rush
description: Pencil Rush is a casual game where you pick up your tool – a colored pencil and start the challenge. Swipe pencils, trace, and race your way along the obstacle course. (You gotta avoid those obstacles. Hit them, and it’s game over!) Add to your color collection by picking up more pencils along the run. Run and make it to the finish line where you can color an amazing picture.
